title: Firebase Authentication with Email/Password - Success
description: Verify user can successfully sign up and log in using valid email and password credentials via Firebase Authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to login/signup page.
Input valid email and password credentials.
Click the sign up button.
User account is created and user is logged in.
Log out from the app.
Input the same valid email and password on login form.
Click login button.
User is successfully logged in.

title: Firebase Authentication with Email/Password - Failure
description: Verify login/sign up failure scenarios for invalid or missing email/password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page.
Input invalid email format or empty password.
Click sign up button.
Display proper error message for invalid input.
Navigate to login page.
Input non-registered email or incorrect password.
Click login button.
Display authentication failure message without logging in.

title: Firebase Authentication with Google Login - Success
description: Verify user can successfully authenticate via Google OAuth login using Firebase Authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Click Google login button.
Complete Google account OAuth authorization flow.
User is successfully authenticated and logged in using Google account.

title: Onboarding Questionnaire Data Collection and Storage
description: Validate the onboarding multi-step questionnaire collects user family info, homeownership, priorities, and location correctly and stores data for AI customization.

steps.description: Launch app after fresh signup and authentication.
Complete each onboarding step with valid data: family makeup, housing status, priorities, location.
All questionnaire inputs accept valid data and prevent incomplete progression.
Finish onboarding flow.
Collected data is correctly stored in user profile in database.

title: App Walkthrough Trigger and Completion
description: Verify the 6-step app walkthrough automatically triggers for new users and records progress correctly.

steps.description: Sign up and log in as a new user.
App walkthrough sequence is displayed immediately.
Navigate through all 6 walkthrough steps.
Walkthrough progress is tracked and completion is recorded to prevent repeating on next app open.

title: Browse Task Categories Including Projects & Fixes
description: Validate browsing task categories loads correctly, projects & fixes category displays large projects with AI-generated subtask breakdowns.

steps.description: Navigate to browse tasks page after login.
Task categories including 'Projects & Fixes' are visible.
Select 'Projects & Fixes' category.
Large home maintenance projects are listed with AI-generated subtasks displayed.
Expand a project to view detailed AI breakdown of subtasks.
Subtasks correctly represent achievable steps for weekend completion.

title: Task CRUD Operations and Status Management
description: Verify creation, reading, updating, completion, snoozing, and bulk management of tasks functions correctly with proper status tracking.

steps.description: Create a new task with valid details.
Task is saved and visible in task list.
Update the task's title, description, and due date.
Updates are saved and correctly displayed.
Mark task as completed.
Task status changes to completed.
Snooze a task to postpone its due date.
Task due date is updated appropriately.
Select multiple tasks and perform bulk status update or deletion.
Bulk action executes correctly on selected tasks.

title: AI-Powered Dynamic Task Generation Based on User Context
description: Verify tasks generated dynamically adjust accurately according to user family data, location, time, and behavioral patterns.

steps.description: Load user profile with defined family context, location, and behavioral patterns.
Trigger dynamic task refresh system.
AI-generated tasks reflect user’s family makeup and regional considerations.
Tasks adjust per time of day and detected behavior patterns, e.g., preferred task times.

title: Daily AI Check-in Conversational Guidance
description: Validate daily AI check-in provides relevant, motivating, and context-aware task suggestions without errors.

steps.description: Trigger daily AI check-in session.
Conversational AI mentor provides task suggestions based on current context.
Motivational messages are relevant and empathetic.
No errors occur during conversation.

title: Voice Task Creation via Speech-to-Text
description: Verify users can record a voice task, and the transcription is accurate and saved as a new task entry.

steps.description: Activate voice task recorder feature.
Speak a task description clearly.
Speech is recorded and sent for transcription.
Transcribed text is displayed and user confirms to save task.
New task is created with transcribed text as title or description.

title: Emergency Mode Activation and Simplified UI
description: Verify that Emergency Mode activates appropriately upon overwhelm detection and simplifies task view to reduce user stress.

steps.description: Simulate high-stress user activity or manually activate Emergency Mode.
App enters Emergency Mode with simplified task management interface.
Complex or numerous tasks are collapsed or filtered to reduce clutter.
Exit Emergency Mode.
UI returns to normal comprehensive task management view.

title: Smart Push Notifications Delivery and Contextual Accuracy
description: Validate push notifications are sent on time, contain relevant contextual reminders or achievement updates based on user behavior and task status.

steps.description: Trigger task reminder and achievement events in test environment.
Push notifications are received on device timely.
Notifications content reflects accurate task context or achievement status.

title: Mobile Dashboard Responsiveness and Touch Navigation
description: Verify dashboard renders correctly on various mobile devices and screen sizes, and touch interactions are smooth and intuitive.

steps.description: Open app dashboard on multiple mobile devices and screen simulators.
Layout and components adjust responsively to screen size.
Perform touch navigation gestures such as taps, swipes, and scrolling.
All touch interactions respond without lag or errors.

title: Achievement System Tracking and Feature Unlocks
description: Verify achievement streaks, milestone rewards, and subsequent feature unlocks function correctly based on user task completion behaviors.

steps.description: Complete tasks repeatedly to trigger achievement streaks.
Achievement streak counters increment correctly.
Reach milestone thresholds.
Milestone rewards are granted and visible in achievement dashboard.
Appropriate features are unlocked after milestones.

title: Sidekick AI Chat Responsiveness and Task Suggestions
description: Validate Sidekick AI chat provides relevant productivity advice and task suggestions promptly in response to user inputs.

steps.description: Open Sidekick AI chat feature.
Input common user queries or requests related to tasks or productivity.
Sidekick AI responds correctly with relevant task suggestions or advice.
Responses are timely and free from errors.

title: Seasonal and Regional Task Suggestions Accuracy
description: Verify that seasonal task intelligence updates task suggestions appropriately based on user's regional weather patterns and state.

steps.description: Set user location to various regional states with different seasonal conditions.
Trigger task suggestion refresh.
Suggested seasonal tasks match expected tasks for given region and season.

title: Relationship and Child Age-Specific Task Suggestions
description: Verify personalized task suggestions reflect spouse/partner names and family context including children’s ages and developmental milestones.

steps.description: Input family context including partner name and children’s ages in onboarding.
Trigger dynamic task generation.
Task suggestions include relationship-focused and age-appropriate child tasks.

title: Homeowner vs Renter Task Filtering
description: Validate task filtering shows relevant tasks based on user's housing situation selected during onboarding.

steps.description: Complete onboarding with housing status set as homeowner.
View task lists.
Maintenance and improvement tasks relevant to homeowners are displayed.
Repeat onboarding as renter.
View task lists again.
Tasks irrelevant to renters are filtered out accordingly.

title: Dynamic Task Refresh with Context and Behavioral Shifts
description: Verify the dynamic task refresh system updates tasks in real-time upon changes in time, completion events, or shifts in behavioral patterns.

steps.description: Complete a task and observe task list refresh.
New task suggestions reflect completion and updated priorities.
Change system time or user location context.
Task list updates to reflect new contextual data.
Trigger changes in detected behavioral patterns (e.g., preferred task time).
Task suggestions adapt accordingly on next refresh.

title: Task Analytics and Dashboard Performance Tracking
description: Validate task completion statistics, productivity insights, and personal performance data render accurately in dashboard components.

steps.description: Complete multiple tasks over several days.
Open dashboard statistics and quick overview components.
Completion rates, streaks, productivity charts, and insights display accurately reflecting user data.
